#summary A collection of links to related resources

= Lua =

  * [http://lua.org/manual/5.1/ Lua 5.1 Reference Manual]
  * [http://www.inf.puc-rio.br/~roberto/pil2/ Programming in Lua] First edition is available online, but it is recommended to read second one.
  * [http://www.lua.org/lua-l.html Lua Mailing List]
  * [http://lua-users.org/wiki/ Lua Users Wiki]

If you want to get a grasp of why Lua is what it is, read these two:

  * [http://www.tecgraf.puc-rio.br/~lhf/ftp/doc/jucs05.pdf The Implementation of Lua 5.0]
  * [http://www.tecgraf.puc-rio.br/~lhf/ftp/doc/hopl.pdf The Evolution of Lua]

Deep technical info on details of Lua VM:

  * [http://luaforge.net/docman/view.php/83/98/ANoFrillsIntroToLua51VMInstructions.pdf A No Frills Intro to Lua 5.1 VM Instructions]
